chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G has a problem:
The screen went black and the phone is still on. 

Thank you,

Hello Juan Angel: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a location that is most convenient for you to send your package. You can find a list of drop-off points here: https://www.seur.com/en/busqueda-tiendas.do Return Preparation: 1. Consult the instructions on how to return a product. 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your item. 3. Remove any protective cover or screen protector it may have. 4. Package the item and its accessories following these guidelines. Packaging of the Item: • The box must be strong and resistant. You should place the item inside the box securely so it doesn't move during transportation. • Stick the return label on top of the box (you can also add an additional label inside to help identify the shipment in case the original label comes off or gets damaged). • Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case the item is damaged during transportation. The return is ready for shipping! We'll notify you when it arrives. Best regards, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>repair<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the repair. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Oscar Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
